statements: DELETE FROM data_warehouse WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND customer_id = 500;
DELETE FROM data_warehouse WHERE id = 1 AND customer_id = 100
DELETE FROM data_warehouse WHERE product_id = 200 AND quantity > 10
DELETE FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Negative' AND analysis_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Regression' AND analysis_date >= '2021-10-01') AND data_date < '2021-11-01';
DELETE FROM table2 WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM table3 WHERE analysis_result = 'successful')
DELETE FROM data_warehouse WHERE warehouse_name = 'Warehouse ABC';
